Class DecimalFallsBelow

java.lang.Object

public class DecimalFallsBelow
extends ProcessEvent

process event indicating, that the value of a decimal signal has fallen below a given value

Method Detail

fire

public boolean fire()
             throws ProcessException
Description copied from class: Fireable
is called by jPac in every cycle to check, if the fire condition occured the fire condition must be true for at least one call. on occurrence it is latched by the Fireable, until it is processed. Must not be called by the application directly.

Specified by:
fire in class Fireable
Returns:
true, if the fire condition occured
Throws:
ProcessException - if the application code produces an process exception. It is passed onto the awaiting module.

used, to check, if this fireable implements the identical fire condition as f.

Overrides:

Parameters:
fireable - the Fireable to check
Returns:
true, if both fire conditions match
